message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.MM 

The paper deals with gesture recognition from video streams, which is a common task in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed methodology involves setting latent values in Conditional Random Fields (CRFs), which is a machine learning technique (cs.LG). The paper also mentions using an heuristic to estimate gesture complexity, which is a common approach in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the task of recognizing human gestures is often associated with human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and multimedia (cs.MM).
